title: 求命令方块大神教一下
author: ly805999964
txt_content:
怎么能把某种掉落物 变成另一种掉落物
我是想用execute和kill
但是我不会选中特定id的掉落物，只会用@e[type=Item]
求教 怎么选中特定id的掉落物？
顺便问一下，怎么选中多种实体？

replies.author: chyx
replies.txt_content: 用计分板给指定id的物品加分或tag          然后再用实体选择器选

replies.author: 我chao爱MC
replies.txt_content: 高频:scoreboard players tag add @e[type=Item] needkill {id:"minecraft:log"}，高频kill @e[tag=needkill]

replies.author: ly805999964
replies.txt_content:
我chao爱MC 发表于 2016-4-13 12:35
高频:scoreboard players tag add @e[type=Item] needkill {id:"minecraft:log"}，高频kill @e[tag=needkil ...
没用啊……

replies.author: ly805999964
replies.txt_content:
chyx 发表于 2016-4-13 12:28
用计分板给指定id的物品加分或tag          然后再用实体选择器选
怎么给“指定id”加分？

replies.author: chyx
replies.txt_content:
我chao爱MC 发表于 2016-4-13 12:35
高频:scoreboard players tag add @e[type=Item] needkill {id:"minecraft:log"}，高频kill @e[tag=needkil ...
id要放在Item里面
